thread.title: M. D. Moore
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by M. D. Moore

author: M. D. Moore
title: M. D. Moore
text: I was skeptical at first, ordering for an important occasion, sight unseen and someone I had not heard of. Decided to "go for it". Later, a friend commented on the beautiful arrangement. I was so relieved! Thanks to Avas for their expertise. My "go to" on line company from now on!!
